about_the_game: Meet the new heroine of the game world "Find the Sunbed"! Introduce a bit of freshness and beauty with Jane, experience completely new sensations and let your nerves soothe with the help of feminine shapes. The second, long-awaited expansion will once again provide you with an amazing experience and make going through the main plot and creating the story even more enjoyable.
detailed_description: Meet the new heroine of the game world "Find the Sunbed"! Introduce a bit of freshness and beauty with Jane, experience completely new sensations and let your nerves soothe with the help of feminine shapes. The second, long-awaited expansion will once again provide you with an amazing experience and make going through the main plot and creating the story even more enjoyable.
